collin.title: Algomask Facial
collin.summary: A perfect facial for dehydrated, sensitive and/or rosacea-prone skin.  The Algo Mask soothes, hydrates and gives instant radiance to the skin.

collin.title: Sea C Spa Facial
collin.summary: Intensive Vitamin C anti-aging treatment. Great for preventing and repairing sun damaged skin. Destroys free radicals and replicates elastin for firmer and younger looking skin.

collin.title: Hydro Lifting Facial
collin.summary: Formulated to deeply rehydrate, restore, lift and firm the skin for instant radiance and enhanced skin tone.

collin.title: Oxygen Facial
collin.summary: Formulated to clear skin congestion, control acne and revitalize fatigued, stressed and dulled skin.

collin.title: Collagen Facial
collin.summary: An intensive hydration formula proven to regenerate and reduce the appearance of fine lines. Corrective facial for everyone with mature skin type.

facial.title: Organic Essence Facial
facial.summary: A unique revitalizing facial regime that eliminates daily stress. Tension and fatigue from the face treatment includes gentle cleansing, enzyme peel and detoxifying steam. Luxurious massage techniques intensify the customized creams and serums. Eyes are revived with a firming mask. Individual skin type is determined and treated with a custom-blended mask.  The complexion is left  refreshed. Radiant and glowing.

facial.title: Deep Cleansing Facial
facial.summary: Our Deep Cleansing Facial is great for any one with imperfect skin.  A deep clean facial is great for oily or problematic skin.  If you suffer from acne breakouts often, this is a good solution for the problem.

facial.title: Casmara Facial
facial.summary: The CASMARA laboratory has developed the ultimate cosmetic line to prevent the passage of time from being reflected in your skin. High-technology cosmetics which will renew your skin smoothing wrinkles and expression lines. Skin visibly younger.

facial.title: Acne & Oily Skin Facial
facial.summary: Acne facials or deep cleansing facials are recommended for clients prone to oily or acneic skin or for those with uneven complexions. Both men and women can take advantage of the benefits of acne/deep-cleansing facials, which generally incorporate a combination of thorough steaming, deep cleansing, facial extractions to remove pore-clogging sebum, and a variation of a healing mask and moisturizer.

facial.title: Basic Facial w/ BioLift Eye treatment
facial.summary: Combine our basic treatment with proven Bio-Lift Eye Treatment.

facial.title: Microdermabrasion
facial.summary: With the most recently updated and advanced diamond technology, the Microdermabrasion resurfacing facial primarily treats sun damage, acne scars, enlarged pores, unbalanced skin tone, wrinkles and skin pigmentation. Reveal your natural beauty hiding underneath your epidermal layers and let your skin have that youthful and vibrant complexion with this latest technology.

facial.title: BioLift Facial Treatment
facial.summary: Our most acclaimed facial includes preventative treatments, such as non-invasive electric microcurrents that deliver immediate results sans down time.  Lauded for its supreme lifting, sculpting, and firming.

facial.title: Biboting Facial Treatment
facial.summary: Biboting is a treatment that combines cupping, acupuncture, gua sha, moxibustion, and massage all in one. Biboting can make your skin breath in and out to keep your body at balance. Deep penetration through the subcutaneous tissue unblocks the meridians to regulate health.

facial.title: Casmara Treatment
facial.summary: Rejuvenate dry skin with Casmara personalized treatment in single-dose phases combined with the benefits ofvarious masks.

makeup.title: Eyebrow: Handcraft + Machine
makeup.summary: This service uses both Handcraft & Machine to accomplish trusly a realistic eyebrows with dimensions of lines & shades (Hairstrokes & Ombre).

makeup.title: Eyebrow: Hairstrokes + Ombre
makeup.summary: Combination of the shading and hair stroke technique, whereby strokes are made closer to one another creating a shaded dimensional appearance.

makeup.title: Lip's Lines only
makeup.summary: This method uses different shades of color to blend the lip line to complement the natural color, the treatment which is to last 8-10 years, will give you a new fuller lips with no injections necessary.

makeup.title: Full Lips
makeup.summary: This method not only give you fuller lips through lip line tattoo, but also  lled in the lips with di erent shades of color to give you the appearances of a fuller full lips.

makeup.title: Eyeliner Ombre
makeup.summary: Enhanced eyeliner Microblading with Ombre effect.

makeup.title: Color Removal
makeup.summary: Color Correction for Eyebrow, Eyeliner or Lips.

makeup.title: Retouch Services
makeup.summary: For ALL Permanent Makeup retouch services.

spa.title: Black / White Doll Facial
spa.summary: It is one of the most advanced treatments for minor skin imperfections and promotes a smooth and glowing complexion.  e Carbon Laser Peel Treatment helps reduce  ne lines and wrinkles including ‘crow’s feet’.  The process is non invasive and pain free.

spa.title: LED Light Therapy
spa.summary: LED works by penetrating into the dermis layer of the skin, energizing the cells that are responsible for reproducing collagen & melanin, helping to reverse the signs of aging, giving you a smoother & more even skin tone.

spa.title: Hydro Dermabrasion
spa.summary: It is the latest renovation in skincare technology. Utilising water jets, the outer layer of the skin will be broken up.  This will reveal a smoother, more even texture of the skin.

spa.title: Hyperbaric Oxygen Treatment
spa.summary: Promotes natural collagen and elastin production improving skin texture, visibly smoothing fine lines and wrinkles.

spa.title: Dermapen Micro-needling Treatment
spa.summary: Is a minimally invasive technique that boosts your skin's production of collage and elastin, two of the most important substances in maintaining plump, youthful, glowing skin.

spa.title: RF Body Contouring
spa.summary: Non-invasive body-contouring treatments powered by radiofrequency (RF), to reducing skin laxity (looseness) to improve the appearance of excess or sagging skin.

spa.title: Ultrasonic Cavitation Treatment
spa.summary: Noninvasive ultrasonic-cavitation treatments are designed to contour the body and reduce fat.  The energy works to liquefy fat cells for natural disposal by the body.

spa.title: Thermage Treatment
spa.summary: Uses radiofrequency technology to heat the deeper, collagen-rich layers of the skin. The applied heat causes collagen to contract and encourages new collagen to start growing. This helps create smoother skin after just one treatment with results that continue to improve.

spa.title: Nano-Needling Treatment
spa.summary: The procedure uses the high quality MD Needle Pen device along with a nano needle cartridge to specifically treat the uppermost layers of the epidermis.

spa.title: Pico Laser Treatment
spa.summary: Focus treatments with the PicoSure laser activate your body’s natural skin cell processes for healthy, more youthful-looking skin. Only Focus treatments lighten unwanted pigment AND uniquely stimulate the production of new collagen and elastin—keys to younger-looking skin—without the pain or downtime of other laser treatments.

spa.title: Ultra Therpy
spa.summary: Is a non-invasive way to lift & tighten brows, under the chin, neck, & improve lines & wrinkles on the chest & décolletage with ultrasound technology.

packages.title: Deep Cleansing Facials w/ Microdermabrasion
packages.summary: Deep Cleansing facials with added benefits of Microdermabrasion.

packages.title: Tier I Treatment with Machines
packages.summary: This Packages includes 10x Spa Treatment with Machines (all the $250 price point services).  Can choose from the following:  Aqua Peel, White Dollface, Black Dollface, LED Light Therapy, Hydro Dermabration, Hyperbaric Oxygen Treatment, Micro-Needling Treatment, RF Body Contouring and Ultrasonic Cavitation Treatment.

packages.title: Tier II Treatment with Machines
packages.summary: This Packages includes 10x Spa Treatment with Machines (all the $350 price point services).  Can choose from the following:  Thermage Treatment or Nano-Needling Treatment.

packages.title: Tier III Treatment with Machines
packages.summary: This Packages includes 10x Spa Treatment with Machines (all the $680 price point services).  Can choose from the following:  Pico Laser Treatment or Ultra therpay.
